channel.title: Microsoft Learn - in Intune
channel.description: The latest updates from Microsoft Learn in Intune

item.title: Role-based access control (RBAC) with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how RBAC lets you control who can perform actions and make changes in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Domain join profile settings for Windows devices in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Create a domain join device configuration profile for Microsoft Entra hybrid joined devices. Use this profile to deploy on-premises Active Directory domain information to devices provisioned with Windows Autopilot and Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Microsoft Intune product and capabilities documentation
item.description: Learn more about how Microsoft Intune products and capabilities can help you secure, deploy, and manage users, apps, and endpoint devices.

item.title: Create a policy using settings catalog in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use settings catalog in Microsoft Intune to configure thousands of settings for Windows 10/11, iOS/iPadOS, macOS, and Android client devices, including Microsoft Office apps, Microsoft Edge, administrative templates (ADMX), and more. Add these settings in a device configuration profile to secure devices, and control different programs and features. Use Microsoft Copilot to get What If analysis, and learn more about each setting.

item.title: Planning guide to move to Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Plan, design, implement, adopt, and move to Microsoft Intune. Get guidance and advice to determine goals, use-case scenarios and requirements, and create rollout and communication plans, support, testing, and validation plans.

item.title: Connect Intune account to managed Google Play account - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to connect your Intune account to your Managed Google Play account.

item.title: Collect device hardware info with the properties catalog - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the properties catalog in Microsoft Intune view and collect enhanced device hardware info on Windows devices you manage with Intune. You can collect info like BIOS version, TPM status, disk info, memory details, and network adapter configurations. Use this information to get deeper visibility into your device inventory and troubleshoot issues.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Collect Diagnostics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to collect diagnostics with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Find lost devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Locate lost or stolen devices by using the locate device feature in Microsoft Intune. Get details on security and privacy information when using the locate device action.

item.title: Endpoint management services and solutions at Microsoft
item.description: Microsoft Intune is a family of on-premises products and cloud services. It includes Intune, Configuration Manager, co-management, Endpoint Analytics, Windows Autopilot, and the admin center to manage cloud devices and on on-premises.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Disable Activation Lock - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use Microsoft Intune to disable Activation Lock on Apple devices.

item.title: Device Query in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use device query in Microsoft Intune to get on-demand device state, run Kusto Query Language (KQL) queries, and troubleshoot devices.

item.title: Device features and settings in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Overview of the different Microsoft Intune device profiles. Get info on GPO, features, restrictions, email, wifi, VPN, education, certificates, upgrade Windows 10/11, BitLocker and Microsoft Defender, and custom device configuration settings in the Microsoft Intune admin center. Use these profiles to manage and protect data and devices in your company.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Reset Passcode - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to reset a passcode with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Sync - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use the device sync remote action in Intune to apply policy, app, and configuration updates to managed devices.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Send Custom Notifications - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Intune to create and send custom notifications to users of iOS/iPadOS and Android devices.

item.title: Work From Anywhere Report in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Discover how the Work from Anywhere report in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics provides insights into remote productivity, device readiness, and user experience.

item.title: Get started with macOS endpoints
item.description: Microsoft Intune guide to set up and configure macOS devices from setup to creating policies and enrolling devices. You secure your corporate and organization-owned endpoints that are enrolled in Intune, and then deploy at scale with Apple Business Manager or Apple School Manager.

item.title: Configure security, email, VPN, and Wi-Fi device configuration profiles - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Step 4 to deploy device configuration profiles as part of the minimum set of policies for your devices using Microsoft Intune. The starting point is to enable the firewall, install AV, scan for malware, install software updates, create a strong PIN policy, and create email, VPN, and Wi-Fi device configuration profiles.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Lost Mode - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to enable Lost Mode in Microsoft Intune to remotely lock a lost or stolen iOS or iPadOS device and display a custom message and phone number on the lock screen.

item.title: Scores, Baselines, and Insights in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Understand endpoint analytics scores, baselines, and insights in Microsoft Intune to measure and improve device performance metrics.

item.title: Admin checklist for Android software updates in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updated for Android devices using Microsoft Intune. See tasks and settings that can manage updates on corporate owned Android Enterprise devices.

item.title: Intune Data Platform Schema - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Review the Intune data platform schema for device query and inventory, including supported properties and data types in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Admin checklist for software updates on BYOD in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updated for BYOD and personally owned devices using Microsoft Intune. See tasks and settings that can manage updates on personal devices on Android and iOS/iPadOS platforms.

item.title: Anomaly Detection in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how anomaly detection in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics proactively monitors device health, detects issues, and provides actionable insights for IT admins.

item.title: Apple configuration list for Intune settings catalog - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the Microsoft Intune settings catalog to add, configure, or restrict features on Apple devices. This article lists and describes the settings you can configure.

item.title: Troubleshooting Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Troubleshoot Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics, including device enrollment issues, startup performance, and data collection problems.

item.title: Application Reliability in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Explore application reliability in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics to analyze app crashes, improve user productivity, and enhance device performance.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Update Cellular Data Plan - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to update the cellular data plan for iOS/iPadOS devices that support eSIM with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Monitor your Endpoint Privilege Management policies for Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: View reports for managed and unmanaged file elevations when you use Endpoint Privilege Management for Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Endpoint Analytics in Microsoft Adoption Score - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how Microsoft Adoption Score integrates endpoint analytics to provide insights on device performance, startup performance, application reliability, and work-from-anywhere readiness for your organization.

item.title: Endpoint Analytics: Optimize Device Performance and User Experience - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Discover how Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics provides actionable insights to optimize device performance, improve user experience, and enable proactive IT troubleshooting.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Remove User - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to remove a user from a Shared iPad with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Logout current user - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use the logout the current user from a Shared iPad with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Shutdown - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to shutdown Apple devices with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Configure Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Step-by-step guide to configure endpoint analytics in Microsoft Intune, enroll devices, and manage data collection policies for device insights.

item.title: Endpoint Analytics Data Collection - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Understand endpoint analytics data collection in Microsoft Intune, including data flow, privacy, and how to stop gathering device data.

item.title: Common tasks and features in the settings catalog - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the settings catalog in Microsoft Intune to configure common features. You can create a Universal Print policy, configure Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome web browsers, and use built in settings instead of plist files for macOS devices.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Wipe - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to wipe, or factory reset, devices with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: What's new in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Find out what's new in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: BitLocker Key Rotation - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to rotate the BitLocker recovery key with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Deployment guide to manage iOS/iPadOS devices in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: A guide to managing iOS/iPadOS devices in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Run Remediation - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to initiate on demand remediations with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Remove Apps and Configuration - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how apps and configurations can be removed temporarily, then restored automatically or manually using the Remove apps and configuration device action with Intune.

item.title: Get support in the Microsoft Intune admin center
item.description: Get online and telephone support for Microsoft Intune and other device management cloud services from within the Microsoft Intune admin center.

item.title: Microsoft Intune Reports - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Intune provides specific report types with focused views that contain consistent and timely data.

item.title: Intune Remote Action: Rotate FileVault Recovery Key - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to rotate the FileVault recovery key with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Advanced Analytics Troubleshooting and Frequently Asked Questions - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Find troubleshooting steps and FAQs for Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics, including endpoint analytics issues, data refresh, and dashboard customization.

item.title: What is Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Discover what Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics is, how it extends endpoint analytics with advanced device insights, proactive troubleshooting, and enhanced reporting.

item.title: Device Scopes in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use device scopes in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics with scope tags for custom device reporting and targeted insights.

item.title: View Software Update Reports for Apple Devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Track Apple device update status in real time with Intune's declarative software update reporting. Learn how Microsoft Intune surfaces update changes directly from managed Apple devices.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Remove Passcode - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to remove a passcode with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Resource Performance Report in Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Explore the resource performance report in Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics for CPU and RAM insights, device performance analysis, and proactive endpoint analytics.

item.title: Set up enrollment time grouping - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Overview and setup of the enrollment time grouping feature in Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Admin checklist for iOS/iPadOS software updates in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updated for iOS/iPadOS devices using Microsoft Intune. See sample policy for different industry scenarios, including shared devices, kiosk, manufacturing, and information worker.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Delete - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to delete devices with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Retire - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to retire device using Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Rotate local admin password - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to rotate the local admin password on Windows and macOS devices with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Deploying Advanced Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to deploy Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics, enable advanced analytics features, and integrate endpoint analytics for proactive device management.

item.title: Startup Performance in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how startup performance in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics helps analyze boot times, identify issues, and optimize device performance.

item.title: Creating elevation rules with Endpoint Privilege Management - Microsoft Intune
item.description: View guidance on how to create strong file elevation rules with Microsoft Intune Endpoint Privilege Management

item.title: Use Microsoft Intune policies to manage macOS software updates - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage system updates for supervised macOS devices.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Play Lost Mode Sound - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use the Play lost device sound remote action in Microsoft Intune to trigger an audible alert on a lost, stolen, or misplaced device—helping users locate it quickly and securely.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Pause Config Refresh - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to temporarily pause policy enforcement on Windows 11 devices using Intune's Pause Config Refresh remote action to support troubleshooting and manual changes.

item.title: Enhanced Device Timeline in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Discover the enhanced device timeline in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics for detailed device event history and advanced troubleshooting.

item.title: Get Support for Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Get support for Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics, including technical troubleshooting, online help, and product feedback options.

item.title: Restart Frequency in Endpoint Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Analyze restart frequency in Microsoft Intune endpoint analytics to identify device reboot patterns, troubleshoot issues, and improve reliability.

item.title: Supported Microsoft Intune Apps - Microsoft Intune
item.description: This article provides lists of support partner and Microsoft apps that are commonly used with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Device Query for Multiple Devices in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use device query for multiple devices in Microsoft Intune to run Kusto Query Language (KQL) queries, analyze device inventory, and gain cross-platform insights.

item.title: Create a Windows Health Monitoring profile in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Add a Windows Health Monitoring profile to collect endpoint analytics and software update events on Windows 10/11 devices in Microsoft Intune. Use this data to recommend software, review startup performance, and fix support issues.

item.title: What is Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Microsoft Intune manages users and devices, simplifies app management and automated policy deployment, and integrates with mobile threat defense. It connects to Managed Google Play, Apple tokens and certificates, and Teamviewer for remote assistance. Can use MDM or MAM to protect data, configure devices, and simplify access to company resources.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Remote Lock - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the remote lock action in Microsoft Intune to lock a managed device that has a passcode or PIN.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Rename Device - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use the Rename device remote action in Microsoft Intune to update the device name shown in the admin center. Useful for standardizing naming conventions, managing shared devices, and improving inventory clarity.

item.title: Plan for Advanced Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Plan Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics by understanding requirements, prerequisites, and best practices for endpoint analytics and advanced reporting.

item.title: Learn about using Endpoint Privilege Management with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: To enhance the security of your organization, set your users to run with standard permissions while Endpoint Privilege Management ensures those users can seamlessly run specified files with elevated rights.

item.title: Configure Update Policies for Apple Devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to configure software update policies for Apple devices using Apple's Declarative Device Management (DDM) model. Improve security, reduce user disruption, and ensure compliance with reliable, automated updates across your organization.

item.title: Admin guide and checklist for macOS software updates - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Guidance and advice for administrators that create and manage software updates for macOS devices using Microsoft Intune. Use this article to help manage software updates on your organization-owned devices, including how to create policies, manage updates, and review update status.

item.title: Intune Remote Action: Deprovision - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to deprovision a chromeOS device with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Full Scan - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to initiate on demand Microsoft Defender full scan with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Battery Health Report in Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how the battery health report in Microsoft Intune Advanced Analytics provides insights into device battery performance, degradation, and proactive replacement strategies.

item.title: Android configuration list for Intune settings catalog - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the Microsoft Intune settings catalog to add, configure, or restrict features on Android devices. This article lists and describes the settings you can configure.

item.title: Network endpoints for Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Review endpoints for Intune. This page lists IP addresses and port settings needed for proxy settings in your Intune deployments.

item.title: Plan and Prepare for Endpoint Privilege Management Deployment - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Plan your Endpoint Privilege Management deploying by understanding requirements, fundamentals, and security recommendations.

item.title: Use Microsoft Intune to manage software updates for supervised iOS/iPadOS devices - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use Microsoft Intune to manage system updates for supervised iOS/iPadOS devices.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Autopilot Reset - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use Autopilot reset with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Fresh Start - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to use Fresh Start to remove or uninstall apps with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Remote Device Action: Restart - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn how to restart managed devices with Microsoft Intune.

item.title: Questions with policies and profiles in Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Common questions, answers, and scenarios with device policies and profiles in Microsoft Intune. Learn more about profile changes not applying to users or devices, how long it takes for new policies to deploy, which settings apply when there are conflicts, what happens when you delete or remove a profile, and more.

item.title: View enrollment reports - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Monitor and troubleshoot issues with enrollment restrictions and enrollment status page assignments.

item.title: Use Remote Help to Assist Users Authenticated by your Organization - Microsoft Intune
item.description: With the Remote Help app, provide remote assistance to authenticated users who also run the Remote Help app.

item.title: Deploy Remote Help with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Follow the steps to deploy Remote Help with Microsoft Intune on Windows, macOS, and Android Enterprise.

item.title: Troubleshoot and monitor Remote Help for Microsoft Intune. - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the troubleshooting and monitoring information for Remote Help with Microsoft Intune to ensure healthy and successful deployment.

item.title: Plan for Remote Help with Microsoft Intune - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Learn about the requirements and capabilities of Remote Help with Microsoft Intune on Windows, macOS, and Android Enterprise.

item.title: Using Remote Help on Windows to Assist Authenticated Users - Microsoft Intune
item.description: Use the Remote Help app to provide remote assistance to authenticated users who also run the Remote Help app, and to troubleshoot for frontline workers (FLW).

item.description: Intune operated by 21Vianet in China.

item.description: See the supported apps, compliance policies, and device configuration profiles that support filters in Intune.

item.description: Create and assign a custom role for a remote device manager.

item.description: Create a bulk enrollment package for Microsoft Intune

item.description: Learn how Conditional Access is commonly used with Intune compliance policy for devices and apps

item.description: Learn how to avoid policy conflicts when creating and deploying new policies.
